title: Holiday shopping turnout jumps to 202.9 million people during Thanksgiving weekend, NRF says
description: Shoppers said they were motivated by sales and promotions, such as limited-time offers, according to the trade group's annual survey.
content: A desire for deep discounts inspired 202.9 million U.S. consumers to shop during the five-day stretch from Thanksgiving Day through Cyber Monday, according to a survey by the National Retail Federati… [+4667 chars]
